title: Received a tampered Optimum Nutrition Protein Powder from https://nutrabay.com/
selftext:
Hi I have been ordering Optimum Nutrition Protein powder from [https://nutrabay.com/](https://nutrabay.com/) from past 2 years, and this time I received the product but I can see at the bottom, it looks like it is broken at bottom and resealed. When I contacted customer care, they are saying we have checked at our end and we see no tampering done at our end so we can't refund you. I am so disappointed with their customer service and this blame to be shift on customer rather than taking accountability. What should I do, I am afraid to consume this product as it might be fake.

what should I do to get refund?

https://preview.redd.it/v4f9jrvl2f4e1.jpg?width=2252&format=pjpg&auto=webp&s=733886c4c6370599d66c9473053d852f0d26ed5d

https://preview.redd.it/p1cjmsvl2f4e1.jpg?width=2252&format=pjpg&auto=webp&s=594f98ebcad9fc32fdda7011cdabd8d1b077cc36

https://preview.redd.it/w82xauvl2f4e1.jpg?width=2252&format=pjpg&auto=webp&s=cba0e6bfd4051c709d44716594bf59a7439459dc

https://reddit.com/link/1h4sgdf/video/scss195n2f4e1/player

[Nutraybay reply](https://preview.redd.it/4zn67xtp2f4e1.png?width=1980&format=png&auto=webp&s=a6cdcb7b833c6e7327c82861dd2aa11219888207)
